    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Called to initialize a controller after its root element has been completely processed.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known. *Java8 docs*
      resourceBundle - resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized. *Java8 docs*

    • onCustomerSelect

      public void onCustomerSelect()
      When the Customer ID combo box is selected, the Cell view shows the Customer ID and the Customer name

      The button view shows just the customers ID

    • onUserSelect

      public void onUserSelect()
      When the User ID combo box is selected, the Cell view shows the User ID and the Username

      The button view shows just the user ID

    • Refresh

      public void Refresh()
      Refreshes the table view for live adds, updates and delete changes to the database LAMBDA EXPRESSIONS -- 2 Lambda expressions used for code efficiency to filter appointments. One filters based on the dates within the month of the current month. The other filters for the week based on the current day.

    • clearAllFields

      public void clearAllFields()
      Clears all text fields and combo boxes

    • isValidAppointment

      public boolean isValidAppointment()
      Validates if appointment text fields are empty
      Returns:
      true if all text fields have values in them and false if any of them are empty; Adds an error message and sends an Alert to the UI if any of the fields are empty

    • isOverlap

      public boolean isOverlap(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int Appointment_ID)
      Checks if there is appointment overlap
      Parameters:
      start - takes the appointment start time
      end - takes the appointment end time
      Appointment_ID - takes the appointment id
      Returns:
      true if the start and end times overlap with a time in the database of the same date. false if there is no overlap in times and dates throws SQLException handles database errors throws Exception catches any other errors other than database
